mapper.sql: select recommend.*, username.name as user_name from recommend left join username on username.email=recommend.user_email

choose.when: and (rec_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or rec_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

mapper.delete: delete from recommend where rec_num=#{rec_num} and user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.insert: insert into recommend (rec_title, rec_content, user_email) values (#{rec_title}, #{rec_content}, #{user_email})
mapper.update: update recommend set rec_title=#{rec_title}, rec_content=#{rec_content}, mod_date=now() where rec_num=#{rec_num} and user_email=#{user_email}
update recommend set views=views+1 where rec_num=#{rec_num}
mapper.select: where true order by rec_date desc, rec_num desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from recommend where true
